job_history.work_description: Holistic solutions for client through identifying new products/services ranging from banking solutions to alternative investment opportunities. Established relationships with key decision-makers within customer's organization to promote growth and retention. Capitalized on industry and marketplace trends to strategize solutions and enhance business operations.

Conducted thorough reviews of small business operations of various vendors to devise and deploy improvement strategies, facilitating consistent returns. Created over $10 Million in new business accounts, selling AMEX brand to small businesses.

Set and administered annual operating budget. Scouted franchise locations, negotiated leases, oversaw facility build out and equipment orders and installations. Trained, coached and mentored staff to ensure smooth adoption all programs.
Founded Brooklyn based fitness start-up company focused on high level, elite clientele. Built referral pipeline by remaining active with community, establishing referral networks and resources.
Managed portfolio of affluent clients with high net worth. Retail client banking, investment advisement, estate planning and basic tax advisory work.

skills.name: Business Development
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in identifying new business opportunities, establishing relationships with key decision-makers, and strategizing solutions to enhance business operations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Has a proven track record of creating new business accounts, selling AMEX brand to small businesses, and managing a portfolio of affluent clients, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.explanation: Has experience in leading teams, training, coaching, and mentoring staff, and has held executive-level positions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in setting and administering annual operating budgets, overseeing facility build out and equipment orders, and ensuring smooth adoption of programs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing portfolios of affluent clients, providing investment advisement, and performing basic tax advisory work, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.explanation: Has experience in identifying industry and marketplace trends to strategize solutions and enhance business operations, suggesting strong proficiency.
